K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-1: aa mri ta kunda li na ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-3: bdud rtsi 'khyal pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-4: bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-5: bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-7: de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-8: bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan te bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-9: dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-10: dga' zhing bar chad med pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-11: btsal nas nyid kyi dbang du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-12: de nas rang lus bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-13: lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-14: bar chad byed pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-15: de nas bsgrub pa'i yo byad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:314b-16: 'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-2: rkyen zlog sman gyi yo byad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-3: de ltar phun sum tshogs ldan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-4: ji bzhin bde bar 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-5: sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-6: tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-7: snga dro'i dus nas dkyil 'khor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-9: sgrub pa chen po bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-10: dri chen dri chu'i skyang nul bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-11: dur khrod thod pa lnga nang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-12: tshil chen me mar re re yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-13: me mar sdong bu lnga brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-14: me mar lnga brgya gtams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-15: de nas sgrub pa brtsam bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-16: rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi bya; ;zhi ba'i tshe na byang du blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-17: g'a na'i tshe na nub tu blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-18: stan chen po lho ru blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-19: rgyas pa'i tshe na shar du blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-20: yang na 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-21: so so'i phyogs phyogs dag nas blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-22: de ltar 'dug stangs bstan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-23: shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-24: sgrub rdzas thams cad gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-25: lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-26: me mar lnga brgya smos pa gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-27: nub kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-28: sgrub pa yab yum gnas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-29: byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-30: rgyu mchog chen po gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-31: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-32: bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-33: bkra shis thod pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315a-34: yang na bandha dpal ldan rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-0: @315b dbus na bu ga gcig yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-1: de yi nang du hr'i zhes bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-2: de yi nang du blugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-3: snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-4: gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-5: dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-6: 'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-7: mang po 'dus pa mthu byin che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-8: yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-9: go tsi h'a dang leng leng hva //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-10: gi wang tsi'u tang ra sa yan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-11: ga pur mu tig lan tshva rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-12: 'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-13: yang na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-15: ger rgya aa ru ra dang lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-17: sha lnga dag dang sbyar ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-18: dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-19: de yi phrad du dgos pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-20: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-21: gtso bo tsitta nyid dang lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-22: shing tog rgun 'brum ka ko la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-23: aa 'bras pa na bum sha lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-24: drin chen po sna lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-25: cha yi grangs dang mnyam ste sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-26: n'a ga ge sar shing tshva dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-27: sug smel ganda pa tra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-28: kun du ra dang dri sna lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-29: yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-30: rgya spos dz'a ti pha la dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-31: ga pur tsandan li shi lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-32: de bzhin spos lnga'i dam pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-33: aa ka ru dang du ru ska //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-34: pog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-35: gser dngul zangs lcags g-yu dang lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-36: brdar ram zhib tu btags te blugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-37: 'di dag rab tu mnyam zhing gsog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:315b-38: 'di dag sbyar zhing btags pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-0: aom aa mri ta mu sa la gra @316a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-1: he ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-2: 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-3: dngos grub 'bras bu nges thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-4: 'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-5: byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-6: me lce gla gli snying la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-7: gsang ba'i brda tshig dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-8: de dag rab tu sba zhing bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-9: phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-10: rgyu mchog chen po khrus byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-11: mngon spyod mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-13: ae yi dkyil 'khor sum brtsegs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-14: steng du bzhag nas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-15: de nas dpal chen he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-16: dur khrod bdag po chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-17: che mchog shin tu mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-18: dbu mang phyag cha rtsub pa bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-19: smug nag sku ni 'bar ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-20: zhal ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-21: phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-22: aom badzra mah'a shr'i he ru ka ram dzva la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-23: gsang ba'i yum yang yab dang mthun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mu dra aa bhi shinytsa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-27: gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-28: phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-29: de yang tshul bzhin byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-30: ae hye hi mah'a ru tra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-31: sarbed aa aa zhes brjod pas tsitta drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-32: yang nas yang du sbar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-33: dug gsum rtsa ba der bcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316a-34: rgyu 'bras mthun zhing sbyar ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-0: yangs shing @316b rgyud la goms pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-1: chos sku zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-2: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-3: nges pa'i don dbang thos par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-4: 'byung ba bzhi las skyed pa'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-5: tshul bzhi dag dang ldan pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-6: yang na mtshan bzang sum cu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-7: lus la rdzogs par yod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-8: zla gsang dkar dmar rlung dkar lci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-9: de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-10: btsal nas sgrub pa chen po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-11: 'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-12: dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-13: 'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-14: khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-15: ra sa ya na'i gtso bor bya'o; ;bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-16: kun byed thams cad za ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-17: slob ma dpa' rtul gtsang sbra can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-18: skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-19: mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-20: dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-21: srog lus bu dang chung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-22: rin chen sna tshogs 'bul byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-23: sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-24: slob dpon bla ma de la 'bul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-25: de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-26: yud yang panytsa yan chad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-27: rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-28: thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-29: rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i phyir; ;re ba med pas blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-30: ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-31: las kyi gtsor ni bskang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:316b-32: sbyang dang mtshams dang gsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-2: bdag nyid dpa' bo 'bru lnga yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-3: gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-4: dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-5: ma thob bar du mi gtang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-6: btang na bar chad chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-7: gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon tan 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-8: sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub dgos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-9: mkhas pas bden pa'i don shes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-10: don la the tshom ci ste za; ;zhes the tshom bcad la dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-11: aa ho su ka dharma ga ya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-12: aa mri ta siddhi hr'i: zhes dngos grub blang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-13: gnas lnga dag tu bsam pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-14: spyi gtsug dbus su zla ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-15: der ni aom dkar 'od ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-17: slar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-18: rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-20: slar 'dus mtha' yas chos kyi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-21: mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-22: snying gar yi ge h'um mthing ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-25: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-26: yang na bdud 'dul sa gnon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-27: lta bar yi ge sv'a ser po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-29: slar 'dus rin chen dam pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-30: phyag rgya yid bzhin sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-31: gsang bar yi ge ha ljang khu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317a-33: slar 'dus don yod grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-0: zhi ba'i phyag @317b rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-1: rigs lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-2: rang byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-3: de ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-5: khams gsum 'gro ba'i don byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-6: slar 'dus sman lnga nyid la bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-7: sman nyid phyag rgyar gsal 'bar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-9: phyag mtshan so sor gsal 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-10: gser gyi 'khor lo zur brgyad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-11: dri chen bdud rtsi zhu ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-12: h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-13: 'bar nas byang chub sems su zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-15: mah'a mam sa bdud rtsir zhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-16: hr'i: las 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-19: dag pa'i dri chu bdud rtsir zhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-21: goms pas yang nas yang du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-22: de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-23: bsam pa'i yi ge dam pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-25: rtsa ba'i yi ge lnga po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-27: de nas 'dzab sgom bzlas pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-29: aom badzra tsitta sa ma ya h'um tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-30: de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-31: lag pa g-yon pa'i dpung pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-32: mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-33: rdo rje mtshon gang bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-34: mdzub mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-35: sbyar te lag pa'i mthil gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:317b-36: bdud rtsi snod kyi steng du mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-0: de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis @318a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-3: bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-4: glal dang lud pas bar mi gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-5: de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-6: badzra aa mri ta aom a'a:h'um hr'i th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-8: dza:h'um bam ho: mah'a aa mri ta a'a be sha ho zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal bas bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-9: bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung las 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral bar lung nges pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-10: de bsgral nas de sman du sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa'i bdud rtsi chen po sa ma ya 'bum sde las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-011:318a-11: bam po chen po drug pa'o ////
